sentences.sContent: By monitoring their brain waves, he saw a pattern of high frequency neural activity in the right frontal cortex that identified in advance who would solve a puzzle through insight and who would not.
sentences.sContent_eng: By monitoring their brain waves, he saw a pattern of high frequency neural activity in the right frontal cortex that identified in advance who would solve a puzzle through insight and who would not.
sentences.sCn: 通过脑电波监测，他发现这些人在解开谜语之前，其右额叶皮质会出现一种高频率的神经活动，通常在得出答案的八秒钟甚至更短的时间内发生。

synos.tran: 额的；[气象]正面的，前面的

phrases.pCn: 正面；锋面；最大截面；额区
锋区；锋带；锋面；前缘地带
